title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 216.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 216.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part applies for all iron and/or steel processes
except for ferrous jobbing foundries subject to Part 213 and ferro alloy
production furnaces subject to Part 212 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
216.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
